Ken Larson was awarded the Bronze Star during two military tours in Vietnam. His career subsequently spanned 36 years with major aerospace and defense companies and small business consulting. Ken received the SCORE National Achievement Award in 2010 and the MicroMentor Award for Outstanding Service In Mentorship in 2021. Micro Mentor and SCORE are non-profit organization offering free assistance to small business in business planning, operations, marketing and other aspects of success.

This is the official Mastodon account for Democrats Abroad, the Democratic Party arm for the millions of Americans living outside the US. We strive to provide Americans abroad with a Democratic voice in our government and to elect Democratic candidates by mobilizing the overseas vote.

To register, or get overseas voting information for your state, go to http://VoteFromAbroad.org.

We post daily.

Stephen Gutknecht.
Broken mind with autism and pretty much brain damage .

Early pioneer in social media. I ran a hangout site called The Fortress in 219 area code in USA back in the 8-bit ASCII days of dial-up 1200bps. Authored the software myself, even sold it commercially.

Lived all over, including North Africa, South America, Middle East, Bali, RV in USA at age 30 for many years.

Old, broken mind, trying to untangle the maps to heaven using #FWakeNeilPostman & #FWakeCarlSagan as notes.
